# Difficult usage of smartsizing in mRemote

## Expected Behavior
I use smartsizing to exceed the resolution of my laptop. In fact, my laptop has a resolution of 1920x1080. When I connect to the machines I use, I set the resolution to 1920x1200 with smartsizing enabled. As a result, my remote screen is resized to fit completely on my laptop's display.
